{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WLM2-AM54 |revision=G54/H |availability=not in the US |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.9 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8241;XPC8241LVR200D; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=D45128163G5-A75LT-9JF |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit),Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |serial=DIN |jtag= |wi1_module=Buffalo WLI-CB-G54 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module=Buffalo WLI-MPCI-AG54 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4309 |wi2_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip2_model=BCM2060 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=a |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=ADMtek |eth_chip1_model=AN983BL |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:0B |oui_eth=00:0D:0B }} [http://buffalo.jp/products/catalog/item/w/wlm2-am54g54_ha/ Product page (JP)]
There appears to be a '''Ricoh''' PC Card controller on board.
